verses.name: 1 Kings 8:53
verses.text: For thou didst separate them from among all the people of the earth, to be thine inheritance, as thou spakest by the hand of Moses thy servant, when thou broughtest our fathers out of Egypt, O Lord God.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:54
verses.text: And it was so, that when Solomon had made an end of praying all this prayer and supplication unto the Lord, he arose from before the altar of the Lord, from kneeling on his knees with his hands spread up to heaven.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:55
verses.text: And he stood, and blessed all the congregation of Israel with a loud voice, saying,
